entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
